fields.title: Block
fields.description: The serialization Id of the Jigsaw block before generation.

fields.title: Final Block
fields.description: The serialization Id to replace the starting Jigsaw block with.

fields.title: Jigsaw Joint Type
fields.description: The type of Jigsaw joint made with 'target'.

fields.title: Name
fields.description: The name identifier referenced by the 'target' field of another Jigsaw block.

fields.title: Placement Priority
fields.description: The priority used during target block placement.

fields.title: Pool
fields.description: The structure template pool containing possible structures to generate.

fields.title: Selection Priority
fields.description: The priority used during target block selection.

fields.title: Target
fields.description: The name identifier of the Jigsaw block to target within the generated structure.
